Posted By: Enemy_Tricolor (10/7/2010 9:13:29 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This guy is win.  
Sure, he's not that great as far as combat is concerned, but if we looked at everyone in THAT regard, nobody would appreciate people like Oprah, or Bill Gates.  
Just LOOK at this guy! He's so happy, just enjoying life without a care in the Phyrexia ridden world! Well I for one, applaud this jolly gent. Also, he DID cut an opponent down to 10 life in one of my drafts before they could get anything out.  
  
Turn one: Golden Urn (I drafted 4)  
Turn two: OXIDDA (Knievel) DAREDEVEL  
  
He shout out of my hand, tossed that junk in the engine, and slammed into my oppoenent for 4 more turns before they got something other than equipment out. FUN.

posts.post_content: This guy is actually pretty good xD He builds great tempo for sacrificing an artifact (such as Perilous Myr), taking a quick beat, and then making another sacrifice or Goblin-oriented combo... In a very weird way the art is true because this probably is the most stupidly fast Goblin cards ever printed (well maybe not as stupidly fast as lackey, but that's pushing it)
